definitions: the system of pipes, tanks, fittings, and other apparatus required for the water supply, heating, and sanitation in a building

examples.text: you may be able to get a grant to install proper plumbing and bathrooms

shortDefinitions: system of pipes, tanks, fittings, and other apparatus required for water supply

definitions: the work of installing and maintaining plumbing systems

examples.text: the magazine gives a guide to the tools needed for home plumbing

shortDefinitions: work of installing and maintaining plumbing system

definitions: used as a humorous euphemism for the excretory, urinary, or reproductive systems

examples.text: maybe I should talk to my doctor about my plumbing

shortDefinitions: used as humorous euphemism for excretory tracts
